documentation.name: PreProcess Data
documentation.summary: Find internal correlations within data and provide an index of items to remove that will resolve these correlations.

input.name: Data Table / Sample List
input.description: A Caret data signal or data container

output.name: PreProcess Model (To Calibrate Test Data)
output.description: A special Caret model for use in applying preprocessing to other data sets. This is a consequence of Caret's configuration and, confusing as it is, one can use Predict to apply these predictions to a new data container.
